# firehydrant_priority_entity (Resource)

PriorityEntity Resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "firehydrant_priority_entity" "my_priorityentity" {
  default     = false
  description = "...my_description..."
  slug        = "...my_slug..."
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `slug` (String)

### Optional

- `default` (Boolean)
- `description` (String)

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String)
- `position` (Number)

Import is supported using the following syntax:

